title: Profile Counters
description: Holds a map of objects containing counter_value and counter_expiry, keyed by counter_id.

xdm:identity.title: Identity associated with this token
xdm:identity.description: The identity associated with this Profile Counter before profile stitching.

xdm:counterMap.description: A map from counter_id to objects containing counter_value, counter_expiry

value.title: Profile Counter Value
value.description: Represents the latest value of the Profile Counter after being Incremented.

expiry.title: Profile Counter Expiry
expiry.description: Represents the TTL for the Profile Counter.
